adverb.description: Towards, or in the direction of, the Roman Catholic Church or Roman Catholicism; = Romewards.
Towards, or in the direction of, the city of Rome; = Romewards.

adjective.description: Directed towards or facing the city of Rome.
Directed or tending towards the Roman Catholic Church or Roman Catholicism.

origin: Old English (in an earlier sense). From the name of Rome + -ward.
